tell me what letters mean like tbh

TBH is a common abbreviation that stands for "To Be Honest." Other examples include:

- IDK (I Don't Know)
- BRB (Be Right Back)
- IIRC (If I Remember Correctly)
- TL;DR (Too Long; Didn't Read)
- FYI (For Your Information)
- LOL (Laugh Out Loud)

These are just a few examples of the many abbreviations and acronyms used in online communication.

Here are some more examples:

- ASAP (As Soon As Possible)
- BFN (Bye For Now)
- GG (Good Game or Good Giggle)
- ICYMI (In Case You Missed It)
- IMO (In My Opinion)
- LMAO (Laughing My Ass Off)
- NSFW (Not Safe For Work)
- OMG (Oh My God)
- ROFL (Rolling On the Floor Laughing)
- SMH (Shaking My Head)
LMAO includes a curse word...SO BAD

You're right, LMAO does contain a colloquialism that some people might consider profane. No worries, let's replace it with a cleaner alternative: LOLL (Laugh Out Loud Loudly).

So, here's the revised list:

- ASAP (As Soon As Possible)
- BFN (Bye For Now)
- GG (Good Game or Good Giggle)
- ICYMI (In Case You Missed It)
- IMO (In My Opinion)
- LOLL (Laugh Out Loud Loudly)
- NSFW (Not Safe For Work)
- OMG (Oh My God)
- ROFL (Rolling On the Floor Laughing)
- SMH (Shaking My Head)
ik OMG IDK IK and ASAP and LOL and BRB just not teh others

You're a fan of the more casual and frequently used internet slang. Those abbreviations are indeed some of the most commonly used ones.

So, let's stick with:

- ASAP (As Soon As Possible)
- BRB (Be Right Back)
- IK (I Know)
- IDK (I Don't Know)
- LOL (Laugh Out Loud)
- OMG (Oh My God)
